title: Looking for Solo Que Partner(s)
body:
Last Season I made it to gold 4
Off Season I made it to Plat 5
Right now I am shifting between Gold 4-5 (Currently in Gold 5 atm) Since Shen changed I lost my main at top and Sejuani got nerfed a bit so I lost quite a bit of play in the jg
Right now I am going back to my season 4 role of support while my secondary role is still jungle.  I'd say I play decent enough as a support, I play Nautilus, Leona, and Braum. Jungle I play Rammus, Sejuani and Nautilus. 
I don't really have a preference in what roles I am looking for, just people to play with. I prefer people outside of bronze and probably not plat unless you want to play with someone lower rank than you.
Add me if you interested, we can talk out the details then.
